song.englishname: Open The Eyes Of My Heart

english.segment1: Open the eyes of my heart, Lord. Open the eyes of my heart. I want to see you, I want to see you. (repeat 4x)
english.segment2: To see you high and lifted up, Shining in the light of your glory. Lord, Pour out your power and love, As we sing holy, holy, holy.
english.segment3: (repeat first part 2x). (then sing the second part 3x)
english.segment4: Holy, holy, holy. (you are). Holy, holy, holy. Holy, holy, holy. I want to see you. (repeat)
english.segment5: Open the eyes of my heart, Lord. Open the eyes of my heart. I want to see you, I want to see you
english.segment6: To see you high and lifted up, Shining in the light of your glory. Pour out your power and love, As we sing holy, holy, holy. (repeat)
english.segment7: Holy, holy, holy. Holy, holy, holy. Holy, holy, holy. I want to see you. (repeat 2x)
english.segment8: I want to see you. (Lord I want to). I want to see you
